name: Drag & Drop
overview: A new little (Amiga ECS, OCS, AGA) game based on the polpular "Block Puzzle" games everyone knows! The game is created in matter of 1-2 day. It's coded in AMOS and the source-code in the ADF. It is followed by the sequel: Drag & Drop Deluxe with has voice! 7 game modes: EASY: Basic drag &Drop SURVIVOR: If The Timer ends, a block will be replaced into an other free place. TIMEATTACK: Run against time. EXTREME: Run against time , but you are sabotaged by randomly placed blocks. BABY: You always have three choices to select from. UNPREDICTABLE: With every steps You always get random formations. INVERSE: You can put formations to anywhere, even if it is already filled, but it will be inverted. VIRUS: This could be enabled in all the game modes. A virus is eating the filled places in the playing field.
